website_summaries.verdict: A top option for those looking for a versatile, multi-use pulling oil.
pros: Many report an improvement in gum and mouth health and note the high quality of the oil
It also gets top mark for its smooth texture
We love the fact its versatile enough to be used for a variety of health purposes
cons: Some found the sesame-based oil to be overwhelming in scent and taste

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Works well for my weekly abhyanga massage
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Works well for my weekly abhyanga massage. Need to use soap twice to wash it off though. Or else it stays on the skin and stains clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Neetu Verma

customer_reviews.title: Great Raw Sesame Oil for Healthy Skin
customer_reviews.text: Good quality raw sesame oil, which I use for so many things...like oil-pulling, cuts and scrapes, moisturizer, scalp massage, sunburn, eye wash (yes, really,) and bug bites. My grandkid tease me when they get any kind of injury or bug bite...”We know, Gramdma, put sesame oil on it! If we break a bone, you’ll probably say, ‘Put sesame oil on it!’” But, it really works! (Well, not on broken bones.) And, now all three of my grown children use this brand in their homes, as well. This oil is fresh-tasting, so I know it’s not rancid, unlike some other oils I’ve purchased from other suppliers.
customer_reviews.author: GlassSlipper

customer_reviews.title: Product is outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third time ordering this oil - it's that good. I just wish it wasn't so expensive. I add an ounce of fragrance oil to this (Amber Romance), and it becomes a magical after shower body oil enough to last all year.
customer_reviews.author: BettyLiberty

customer_reviews.title: Continously high quality!
customer_reviews.text: For our family it is THE oil to consume, massage with, nourish gums, skin and a shot each day in the dog's food/dish helps if you have cold feet, massage a little on your foot soles and in a few minutes your feet will warm up. for a belly ache massage some of the oil on - it'll help. we think it is a sacred oil!
customer_reviews.author: uvetta venerdi

customer_reviews.title: The Best Oil
customer_reviews.text: I can’t live without this oil! It’s light and absorbs quickly into your skin. I have my husband using it as well. I keep a spray bottle in our shower and whole the water is running spay down and oat into my skin. Your skin is the largest organ on your body and the last part to receive nutrients and moisture. Treat your skin well and you’ll look younger!!!

It’s so big it’s easier to pump it out than to try to pour it out. It would be nice if a pump were included with these larger bottles. Quality of product is excellent.

Thanks for a nice product.

customer_reviews.title: Good for skin, elimination, oral health
customer_reviews.text: An Ayurvedic/Nurse Practitioner recommended daily sesame oil massage to help with some of my Vata-out-of-balance symptoms. She recommended Banyan Botanicals because she feels they have the best and most pure Ayurvedic products on the market. The founders studied with Dr. Lad and had his blessing to start this company. Since I've been using the oil, my skin problems have greatly diminished, and elimination is much more regular. I've also been using it for oil pulling, and the gingivitis in my gums has diminished. The company has great customer service. They reached out to me to ask how I liked the product, and I mentioned that my cap had broken. They sent me a new cap right away. Extraordinary.

I've used other oils by Banyan and they also meet my expectations.

product_meta.title: Banyan Botanicals Sesame Oil – Organic & Unrefined Ayurvedic Oil for Skin, Hair, Oil Pulling & More – Multiple Sizes – 34oz. – Non GMO Sustainably Sourced Vegan
feature_bullets: SESAME OIL is the most popular oil in Ayurveda that has been used for thousands of years. Rich and robust, this unrefined oil supports numerous systems in the body, and its versatility makes it the perfect oil to support the body from head to toe—including the skin, scalp, hair, ears, lips, gums and teeth, and feet. Its uses are virtually endless!

ITS ABILITY to easily absorb into the skin and carry its soothing properties deep into the tissues makes it the perfect oil for self-massage, or abhyanga in Sanskrit, a key practice in Ayurveda. Self-massage with Sesame Oil is a luxurious and nurturing practice that helps protect, moisturize, and nourish the body while it grounds the nervous system and relaxes the mind. It is also commonly used for oil pulling and as a face cleansing oil.

CERTIFIED ORGANIC and unrefined, this golden oil is extracted from the seed using a chemical-free, natural expeller pressed method that retains the oil’s maximum benefits and preserves the unique scent of sesame. However you choose to use it, our Sesame Oil is a wonderful and healthy tool to providing deep self-care.

BANYAN BOTANICALS is committed to producing the highest quality Ayurvedic products using USDA certified organic herbs that are sustainably sourced and fairly traded. All our products are 3rd party tested to ensure product quality and safety.
THE BANYAN GUARANTEE: If for any reason you’re not satisfied with one of our products, we will gladly accept returns for a full product refund.
